participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and hardworking, Jake is passionate about his craft and values the bonds he forms with his pets.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Lily loves to meet new people and has a keen interest in music and cars.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. i have short brown hair. i am a convenience store manager.

content.text: Yo! i like to build houses and sell houses.
